title: There once lived a dog (K)
creator_credit: Soviet Film Studios Moscow and E. Nazarov
brief_description: A delightful Ukrainian folk tale about a pet dog who becomes a nuisance and is dumped in the local woods. The dog, with the help of a wolf, plans a way to be reaccepted by his owners.
creator_credit_for_label: Soviet Film Studios Moscow and E. Nazarov
description: A delightful Ukrainian folk tale about a pet dog who becomes a nuisance and is dumped in the local woods. The dog, with the help of a wolf, plans a way to be reaccepted by his owners.
